name: BomB (itch) (Lucy Ziener)
description:
You only have 10 Seconds to collect Waterdrops before you explode!

Collect Waterdrops to increase the timer.

Controls:

WASD To Move.

ESC To pause or exit.

This game was made within 2 weeks for the GameAWeek project at University of Europe for Applied Sciences. The theme was 10 Seconds.
